A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Dear Disney\, didn’t realize when you made the tag line “let the past die\, kill it if you have to” you were talking to every long time fan\, because you killed my childhood fantasies about what would happen next in the saga. Shame on you Disney\, and I feel sorry for Rian Johnson because his name is attached to this piece of crap\, and I’m sure Disney was being the scenes calling the shots! I’m leaving this island unlike Luke!
